@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“Zenzie, post:2, topic:85991”]Can’t and go away with your free admin seriously who cares of some noob crown

~Zenzie♣[/quote]
lol Thats what i have been saying, anyone who can help is a better coder than you so why would they want admin on a server, when chances are theirs is better. Also you can change it but idk how, its somehting like cache editing or client editing, i tried once but my crown looked retarded lol

and he wasnt asking for how to do that, he ment how to make new crowns for people, like so co owners could have neon crowns or sumthin… i hope or i look stupid

item.title: Changing Colours Of Crowns
item.dc:creator: @matt4302 matt4302
item.description:
@matt4302 wrote:

yeah…but also
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 27, 2007, 07:24:42 PM[/size][hr]ok go to ur source then click charachters folder at the top
then click the blank text (or if you have your name saved click on it)
then search for the around 5th line and you should find…

charachter rights = 0

were going to change this to

charachter rights = 2

(for mod)

charachter rights = 3

(for owner)
click the x
and save
there

[center]loading you are a retard scape
||||||||||
20% loaded
loading…you are a retard php2995097%?cascheyou are a retard[/center]
